metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14153 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: In IJG JPEG (aka libjpeg) from version 8 through 9c, jdhuff.c has an out-of-bounds array read for certain table pointers.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> patch in libjpeg9 9d appears to be: -      entropy->ac_cur_tbls[blkn] = entropy->ac_derived_tbls[compptr->ac_tbl_no]; +      entropy->ac_cur_tbls[blkn] =	/* AC needs no table when not present */ +	cinfo->lim_Se ? entropy->ac_derived_tbls[compptr->ac_tbl_no] : NULL;  per upstream libjpeg-turbo bug, libjpeg-turbo is not vulnerable to this issue

criterions.comment: libjpeg6b package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
libjpeg9 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:9d-1').
